artist: Artist: Torii Kotondo; Publisher: Sakai Shōkichi; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of a nude woman wiping the back of her neck with a blue cloth
inscription: 昭和四年十月 {Shōwa yonen jūgatsu} (October 1929)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 言人 {Kotondo} | embossed publisher seal: 酒井 川口 合板 {Sakai Kawaguchi gōban} (Sakai Kawaguchi joint publication) | on back, label: 外国行貮百枚限絶版　第七十九號　鳥居言人 {gaikoku iki nihyaku mai kagiri zeppan, dai nanajūkyū gō, Torii Kotondo} (limited edition of 200 for foreign export, number 79, Torii Kotondo) | stamp: KAWAGUCHI
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Later edition for export published by Sakai and Kawaguchi, but here is a Kawaguchi stamp on the back indicating that he was the seller.
title: Vapor
